name: Eddy Lover
description: '''Eduardo Mosquera''' (born 16 March 1985), better known by his stage name '''Eddy Lover''', is a Panamanian [[reggaeton]] and [[reggae en Español|Spanish reggae]] singer and songwriter. Lover rose to international fame with his guest appearance on [[La Factoría]]'s 2006 smash hit "[[Perdóname (La Factoría song)|Perdóname]]".
